definition: Hu Jia (1973-), PRC dissident human rights activist
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: Hu is serving a three-and-a-half year prison sentence on charges of subversion.
sentences.chinese: 胡佳以颠覆罪名被判三年半徒刑。

sentences.english: The celebrated diver Hu Jia, for example, will be participating in the upcoming Olympics despite damage to both retinas of his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 例如跳水运动员胡佳将不顾视网膜受伤参加本届奥运。
